Message.Msg: he means it went from 211 to 184 in 27 days 27 points down in 27 days, it bounces it had previously gone up 30 points in 60 days if u ever see a stock go up say from $50, after 50 days watch what happens as expired time equals price heavy selling usually comes in when stock is in uptrend EX: QQQ went from 50 to 70 in 50 weeks recently and subsequently blew apart also: look at square root of 50: see the symmetry???
